titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Freemasons, Ann Arbor Lodge no. 544 records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.subordinate_name: Ann Arbor Lodge no. 544 (Ann Arbor, Mich.)

did.unittitle: Freemasons, Ann Arbor Lodge no. 544 records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Ann Arbor Lodge no. 544 was chartered in 1927. It merged with Fraternity Lodge no. 262 in 1982.
archdesc.scopecontent: Correspondence, reports, programs, and other materials relating to the activities of the Lodge; also minutes of meetings, records of annual picnics, and register of officers, members, and visitors.

corpname.subordinate_name: Ann Arbor Lodge no. 544 (Ann Arbor, Mich.)
